thread.title: Salman Khan fans will celebrate Eid as ‘Bhaijaan Day’
thread.title_full: Salman Khan fans will celebrate Eid as ‘Bhaijaan Day’ - The Times of India

author: Priya Gupta
title: Salman Khan fans will celebrate Eid as ‘Bhaijaan Day’
text:
Salman Khan is not just a megastar, but what makes him extra special is the unambiguous love that his fans have for him. While Salman prides himself on being a part of all religions equally, his connect and positioning with the festival of Eid is extremely strong.
READ: Salman Khan: Interesting facts about the actor
It thus comes as no surprise that one of Salman's key associates over the years, T-Series has created an exclusive mash-up of the best of Salman songs that will be played across many TV channels and radio stations on the day of Eid. His fan clubs too plan to celebrate Eid as their favourite Bhai's day, branding it 'Bhaijaan Day' . While it's natural for any superstar to have his loyal following, what makes this special is that Salman will be the first superstar to have a day in the year branded for him by his fans.
